title: Global Finance Magazine Recognizes Citi as the Best Supply-Chain Finance Provider in Latin America For The Third Year in a Row
summary: Miami, Florida - Global Finance magazine recognized Citi as the Best Supply Chain Finance Provider in Latin America for the third consecutive year. In addition, Citi was named Best Global Supply Chain Finance Provider for the fourth year in a row.
tag-1: Global Finance Magazine Recognizes Citi as the Best Supply-Chain Finance Provider in Latin America For The Third Year in a Row
tag-3: Miami, Florida – Global Finance magazine recognized Citi as the Best Supply Chain Finance Provider in Latin America for the third consecutive year. In addition, Citi was named Best Global Supply Chain Finance Provider for the fourth year in a row.
tag-4: Global Finance's editorial team, with input from industry analysts, corporate executives and technology experts, selected the best providers of supply chain financing and management services. A variety of subjective and objective criteria were used for choosing the winners. Factors considered included: market share and global coverage, product innovation, customer service, technology, execution skills and client-specific implementations.
tag-5: As part of its supply-chain finance business, Citi launched in Latin America the Citi® Supplier Finance Regional Platform, a pioneer web-based platform for payments, discounting, tracking and reporting receivables and facilitating communication between buyers and sellers. Citi® Supplier Finance Regional Platform is a complementary solution to Citi'® Supplier Finance and the overall suite of supply chain finance solutions that Citi offers. With the support of five regional on-boarding hubs covering suppliers in Latin America, and one hub in New York which covers global suppliers, Citi provides its services to the complete supply chain, from initial sellers to final buyers.
tag-6: Citi has more than 10 years of experience implementing supply-chain finance solutions. With more than 850 established programs with buyers in 76 countries, and supporting more than 65,000 suppliers globally. Citi as a leader in the Latin American market has 170 supplier finance programs, processing payments to more than 19,000 suppliers in 19 Latin American countries.
tag-7: Commenting on these awards, Fernando Iraola, Latin America Region Head, Treasury and Trade Solutions, said: "We are committed to continue providing the best supply-chain finance solutions available to our clients in Latin America and the world, in order to continuing fulfilling their needs at the highest standards of excellence. We continue to place significant emphasis on developing long-term relationships with our global, regional and local clients."
tag-8: "This award is the result of Citi's investment during the last few years. We have been working extremely hard throughout this time, and the results show that our business has grown 300 percent in terms of assets having now a business of about US$3.6 billion across Latin America. These results stem from the joint efforts involving the bank's main focus and our team. We pride ourselves on always putting the customer first," says Fernando Malaga, Regional Supply Chain Finance Head for Latin America, Treasury and Trade Solutions.
tag-9: Citi Treasury and Trade Solutions (TTS), provides integrated cash management and trade finance services to multinational corporations, financial institutions and public sector organizations across the globe. With a full range of digital and mobile enabled platforms, tools and analytics TTS continues to lead the way in delivering innovative and tailored solutions to its clients. It offers the industry's most comprehensive suite of treasury and trade solutions including cash management, payments, receivables, liquidity management and investment services, working capital solutions, commercial and prepaid card programs, trade finance and services. As of the first quarter of 2013, average deposits and other customer liability balances were $415 billion.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
